nodes.text: The Colonial Government was the official Imperial ruling body on the planet Goroth Prime. Officially, under the terms of the Interim Constitution, the Colonial Government was an advisory body to the P'Dar'Ken. In reality, the Colonial Government was the true power on Goroth. The Colonial Government was headed by the Colonial Governor, Marsh Limoth, and divided into two branches – the executive branch and the administrative branch. The executive branch was headed by Governor Limoth, while the administrative branch was controlled by Director of Administration Crela Nen. Imperial Navy forces were led by Admiral Val DeGoort while Imperial Army forces were commanded by General Anderton Kloff.
